features: [Fashion Portable]. Portable Steam Iron-Travel Iron can iron clothes anywhere, anytime, without space restrictions. Perfectly stylish travel design, handheld garment steam iron, weighing only 3.5 ounces, can be easily stored in any suitcase or portable in a backpack.

[Easy and Safe]. Wet and dry steam iron - ironing with dry and wet ironing two-in-one design, to meet personalized ironing needs. Easy to operate and safe to use. High temperature and strong steam can easily iron clothes, shirts, curtains, sheets, pillowcases, etc.. It is also a better choice for mothers ironing clothes for children.

[360º No Dead Angle]. Tip curved design - home mini steam iron with triangular tip shape front design, 360º degrees ironing, no dead ends, flexible ironing buttons, lapels, collars and other narrow areas, so that details elegantly displayed.

[Easy to fill water does not leak]. Mini steam iron with 50ml integrated water tank design, easy to add water, no leakage, once can iron more than one piece of clothing. The transparent water tank of the steam iron allows you to keep an eye on the water condition of the tank, making it safer to use. Please note: Since we need to test each iron with water, there will be a small amount of water residue, which is normal.

[Family travel essential] Everything you need to iron every piece of fabric at home or when you travel. Effective steam and remove creases and wrinkles from your clothes such as suits, knitwear, shirts, wedding dresses, it is very suitable for home and travel use. The mini iron is also a perfect gift for anniversaries, birthdays, Christmas, and weddings.
body.description: Multifunction Despite its small size, the mini iron is effective at removing creases from suits and works better with materials that require steam ironing, such as cotton and silk.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini electric iron is a small and portable electric iron, it has the following advantages and features: Portability The mini electric iron is small in size, light in weight, and easy to carry. Whether it is a family trip or a business trip, it can be easily carried. Easy to use The mini electric iron is easy to operate, just need to be plugged in and heated to use, and can be used according to the requirements of different fabrics. Fast heating Mini irons usually have a fast heating function, which can reach the temperature suitable for ironing in a short time, saving time and energy.

Wide range of applications The mini iron is suitable for different types of garments and fabrics, including shirts, skirts, pants, T-shirts, silks, and more. Whether it is home or travel ironing, it can meet the basic ironing needs. Multifunction Despite its small size, the mini iron is effective at removing creases from suits and works better with materials that require steam ironing, such as cotton and silk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet, looks cool 😎
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used the mini iron yet, I will update once I use it for a while. I got mine for sheets and shirts mostly and don't have any other irons at home. I like the minimalistic, retro look and feel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not too bad
reviews.reviewText: This does get very hot. Do not use the silicone protector as it does not prevent the heat from scorching your ironing board. Fortunately, I had another one that came with my other two mini irons.It will often spit out water.This is still very helpful for getting into tiny spots

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Waste of time and money
reviews.reviewText: Honestly not worth the buy. It leaks water everywhere and takes for ever to get a solid wrinkle out of a garment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Near POCKET-sized travel iron?!?!
reviews.reviewText: Travel iron? This cute thing is almost pocket-sized - and it steams! I bought a "travel" iron last year at a store and didn't think they could get smaller, but I was wrong. The first thing I noticed about this travel iron was the cord. It is thick with a fabric material, which I hope means it is long-lasting. Another cool feature is the rubber pad to help block the hot plate from damaging other things in transit. The iron's plate heats up pretty quickly. By the time it was plugged in for 24 seconds, I could no longer sweep it across my hand.To my surprise (at the cost of 1 star), there is no power switch, button, or dial. The instructions say to power off the iron before unplugging it, yet the only way to cut power IS to unplug it. The only button on this unit is a steam button. Between ironings if you want to rest the iron, turn the handle to an "L" shape and set it on a flat surface. You MUST exercise extreme caution because there is only one place to hold the iron when it's hot. The water refill cup is handy; a nylon travel bag would've earned half a star in the rating! It took 2-3 initial presses before the water sprayer dispensed. Overall, good pick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s very light to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the office!
reviews.reviewText: I work at the courthouse right now so I am always in need of a quick ironing or steam. Sitting makes our clothes wrinkle and going before a judge like that... or a jury! That's a no-no. This is small enough to keep my desk drawer without taking up too much space and easy enough to plug in and use quickly. I do think the steam option could be better, but as an iron, it works great!
